name: Siberian Village
description:
Version 0.1 is already available!

Do you live in a big city or by the sea? Even if not, you can always feel like a resident of Siberia.


Being retired, you move from the city to a small Siberian village and in order not to get bored, you decide to extract oil in it, but there are difficulties that you will need to solve.


Plot and mechanics:
Each story chapter, in addition to interesting characters, will introduce you to new mechanics in the game.
You will be able to go bear hunting, visit a mad rural scientist and chat with the inhabitants of typical Siberia.

Weather and time of day:
In Siberia (perhaps you didn't know) the dynamic weather and the cycle of day and night. Full immersion in weather conditions: from light snowfall in the village to the northern lights in the night taiga.

Interactivity:
You can interact not only with the residents. Control the lights throughout the village and interact with household items. Open a business in the Siberian hinterland.

Open world:
In addition to interesting plot chapters, you can choose an open world mode and fully enjoy the atmosphere of life in a Siberian village.
Go to the bartender and find out the news
Visit a rural scientist and check out his new invention
Go to the suburbs to the mechanic Kostya and find out what he is working on today
Expand your business
Go fishing on the lake

* Add the game to what you want, so as not to lose it
